name: Necron Shock
description: Opening party-wide magical damage. Necron's signature electrical attack is supposed to be baited by tanks and swapped.

name: Fear of Death
description: Wide-hitting magical damage that affects many players with fear-based mechanics.

name: Choking Grasp
description: Party-wide magical damage with grasping mechanics. Later becomes a tank-focused attack.

name: Smite of Gloom
description: Major party-wide magical damage attack imbued with dark energy.

name: Shockwave
description: Second instance of the electrical party-wide attack.

name: Fear of Death
description: Repeated fear-based party-wide magical damage.

name: Choking Grasp
description: Continued grasping attack affecting multiple players.

name: The End's Embrace
description: Party-wide magical damage representing Necron's deadly embrace.

name: Grand Cross
description: Necron's signature cross-shaped magical attack dealing massive party-wide damage.

name: Neutron Ring

name: Darkness of Eternity
description: Necron's ultimate darkness attack dealing massive party-wide magical damage.
